comments: Coordination sequence for 18-dimensional cyclotomic lattice Z[zeta_19].Product of 18 consecutive numbers divided by 18!. - _Artur Jasinski_, Dec 02 2007In this sequence only 19 is prime - _Artur Jasinski_, Dec 02 2007With a different offset, number of n-permutations (n>=18) of 2 objects: u,v, with repetition allowed, containing exactly (18) u's. [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Aug 04 2008]
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 18..1000
M. Beck and S. Hosten, Cyclotomic polytopes and growth series of cyclotomic lattices, arXiv math.CO/0508136.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Some formulas adjusted to the offset by _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 07 2009
